thread.title: Taylor Swift crowned queen of Instagram as she beats Kim Kardashian to 50 million followers
thread.title_full: Taylor Swift crowned queen of Instagram as she beats Kim Kardashian to 50 million followers

title: Taylor Swift crowned queen of Instagram as she beats Kim Kardashian to 50 million followers
text:
Taylor Swift crowned queen of Instagram as she beats Kim Kardashian to 50 million followers Taylor Swift crowned queen of Instagram as she beats Kim Kardashian to 50 million followers 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Taylor Swift is officially more popular than Beyonce or Kim Kardashian – and it’s all thanks to her cats. 
The Bad Blood singer just notched up an impressive 50 million followers on Instagram, streaking ahead of Kim and Bey. 
Taylor, 25, ticked off the milestone on October 8, but quickly downplayed the achievement. 
“50 million followers!! Thanks so much guys. I’m pretty sure this is just because I have cute cats though,” she wrote. 
Keeping Up With The Kardashians star Kim trails behind with 48.4million followers while fellow music star Beyonce’s 47.5million seems almost pitiful in the wake of Taylor’s massive Instagram squad. 
Taylor has two moggies, Meredith Grey and Olivia Benson, and frequently posts p-awesome shots of her feline friends to the delight of fans. 
Taylor recently told NME that “people might need a break from me” after her world tour wraps up in December. 
But the nearly 14,500 retweets and 1.2million Instagram likes on her new GQ cover suggest otherwise. Thanks @GQMagazine for my first cover :) pic.twitter.com/lzCz5MbMHT 
— Taylor Swift (@taylorswift13) October 8, 2015 Share article 
Fans couldn’t get enough of the sultry cover shoot where Taylor flashes her thighs in just a black bikini and cover-up. Promoted Stories
